title: Dunnes Stores Scraper Input
description: Input configuration for Dunnes Stores Ireland price scraper

urls.title: Product URLs
urls.description: List of Dunnes Stores product URLs to scrape

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of pages to scrape in parallel

maxRequestRetries.title: Max Request Retries
maxRequestRetries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Request Handler Timeout (seconds)
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Timeout for each page request handler

useResidentialProxies.title: Use Residential Proxies
useResidentialProxies.description: Use residential proxies to bypass Cloudflare (recommended)

proxyCountryCode.title: Proxy Country Code
proxyCountryCode.description: Country code for proxy selection (IE = Ireland)
